He even snagged the elevator for me and punched the floor number because my hands were totally full.  Above and beyond service was noticed and appreciated.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Easy walking distance to many attractions
text:
We spent 10 nights here and were very happy with it.  It was only a short walk to the 34 Penn Street Station (easily doable with luggage) which took us nearly everwhere we wanted you go.   We were within walking distance of many the places we wanted to go to, including the theatre district.   After a late night out at the theatre it was only a 15 min walk back to the hotel without having to worry about the subway or taxis.

The bedroom was a good size, two full queen beds and the decor was quite pleasant.  The bathroom was also a good size and appeared to have been modernized farily recently.   Our room had a bath and we had a problem in that you couldn't fill the bathtub as the metal plug wasn't sealing properly.   Upon reporting this, maintenance turned up quite quickly and fitted a new plug.   Any hotel can have a problem but it is how the hotel responds that shows the quality of the hotel.

I was very impressed with the amount of charging spots available in the room as we all have multiple electronic devices nowdays.      The small fridge in the room was also a bonus and also the availabiity of a guest laundry downstairs.

The lobby is fairly small and was occasionally a little croweded.   There is a breakfast/bistro downstairs but we did not use it.

Opposite the hotel there is a very small store called Non Solo Piada from which I bought absolutely beautiful crossiants each morning.   They are cheap and home made on the spot and defintely a cut above the mass produced varieties.  We also had a pizza from them one night - tasty.

title: First Time in New York and We Will Return to the Courtyard New York Times Square West
text:
I agree with all the positive comments I read from fellow travellers. Our hotel room was one of the cleanest in which we have ever stayed and was large enough for two adults and two older teens. 
The location was ideal, close enough to everything yet far enough from the bustle of the busy streets. We were on the 21st floor and looked onto the back of other buildings and while this may not seem attractive, it was too cool to look into the shoe and other design studios in the adjacent buildings. My girls picked out their favourite shoes from a studio on the 16th floor of one of these studios. Highly recommend this hotel and we will definitely try to book again when we return.

title: Super location
text: Convenient location, lobby and rooms recently renovated. Restaurant area small and nice. Breakfast limited but good for a morning start. Staff very friendly. Rooms are clean. Minutes away Times Square and other main attractions of the city. Very recommendable.

title: Good location, but typical NYC prices
text: Hotel was nice and convenient location.  Lobby seemed recently updated but very cramped and often crowded.  Lobby restaurant was nice and service was excellent.  My main complaint is the prices.  Wish there was an Executive Lounge.  This would have been a 4 star review if not for paying exorbitant rates for an average, although pleasant, business stay in a NYC hotel.

title: Super gemütlich und ruhig, aber mittendrin
text:
Wir haben dieses Hotel hauptsächlich auf Grund der zentralen Lage und des Fitnessraums gewählt. 
Unsere Erwartungen wurden übertroffen. 10 min. zu Fuß zum Timesquare und zur Penn Station. Der Madison Square Garden ist ebenfalls nur 7 Min. entfernt. Dort haben wir uns ein Spiel der NY Rangers angesehen! Bars, Restaurants und Supermärkte sind überall rund um das Hotel verfügbar. Das Hotel ist trotz der zentralen Lage absolut ruhig, sehr gepflegt und luxuriös. Ein super Fitnessraum mit absolut neuen Geräten. 
Wir sind wirklich rund um zufrieden und können dieses Hotel nur weiterempfehlen. Im Dezember ist es natürlich nicht preiswert, aber das muss man wissen und uns war es das Wert.
Haben 320€/ Nacht ohne Frühstück bezahlt.

title: Weekend vacation
text:
Clean, very comfortable bed. Great staff very helpful. The location is perfect. Quick walk to Times Square and the theatre district. Don't
Uber or taxi. Bring good walking shoes and get a map. It's perfect! You see and experience way more walking. Free wifi and a bistro downstairs.

title: Idéalement placé pour séjour Newyorkais
text:
Chambre spacieuse, GRANDS lits, propre, réfrigérateur à disposition, plateau bouilloire avec thé et café, belle salle de bains, ménage irréprochable.
Personnel disponible et sympathique. La climatisation est toujours trop forte mais réglage facile ;) Accès direct en train et métro depuis aéroport du NewJersey et Kennedy. Station de métro à 10 minutes à pieds. Economique !!!! Cambre réservée deux jours avant l'arrivée à un prix très compétitif.

title: Fabulosa opción
text: ¡ Courtyard es una excelente opción para hospedarse ! Está perfectamente ubicado, cerca de Times Square y de la estación del metro. Excelente atención por parte del equipo de recepción. Las camas son deliciosas y muy cómodas. Hay servicio de Starbucks.

title: Well located hotel with friendly staff
text:
I stayed here just before Thanksgiving 2016.  

The hotel is about a 12 minute walk from Penn Station and has good transportation links.

Despite arriving early, the friendly lady at the check-in desk immediately gave me my room key & asked if she could help with any questions I had.

I was only there for a couple of days but the front desk staff were courteous, professional and always ready to help.

The room was clean and though not big, it was fine for a couple of nights.  The bathroom seemed to have been newly renovated so that was a plus too.

I'd definitely recommend this hotel if you're looking for something near Penn Station & Times Square.

title: Great location
text:
The hotel is located in a great location especially for anyone driving, taking a train or bus to the city. It is located on 38th and 8th ave close to just about everything. A separate parking garage is on the same block and it costs $50 per night. The hotel is a few blocks away from the Lincoln tunnel so leaving the city is a breeze. 

The room is a bit on the smaller size but we are in NYC so that was expected. The front desk staff was very pleasant and knowledgeable. We didn't try the bar or onsite breakfast. $180 per night in NYC wasn't too bad.

title: Ótima opção de hospedagem
text:
Ótimo custo benefício, localização excelente com metrô próximo, quarto confortável, banheiro amplo e limpo, possui cafeteria com lanches e cafés estilo Starbucks, funcionários simpáticos e solícitos. Permite deixar malas no hotel até dar o horário de check in/check out.
Com certeza indicaria a amigos e voltaria a me hospedar.

title: Business and Pleasure
text: Great location, Great service and Clean Accommodations. Stayed for 4 nights, part business and part pleasure. Staff was attentive. Room was quiet and comfortable. Didn't get to try the restaurant but it looked good. I will stay again.

title: really a nice suprise so quiet and still  in the middle of everything
text:
this hotel gets so many goods reviews and we now know why
location : perfect
room : quiet, very good bed, very clean everything you need for a good night rest
           and coffee to get you started
staff : all so nice,  their service is wonderful
it was a pleasure to stay at the Courtyard NY TS West 
thank you all for your hospitality

title: Great Location in New York
text: We stayed there for 5 nights together with another couples who had joined us all the way fromthe Transatlantic Cruises and to Boston .New York was our last stop before flying home to Kuala Lumpur. New York hotels are expensive and rooms are smaller. The location is central with walking distances to major attractions, subways, tons of restaurants etc. The room is clean and comfortable ,nothing to complain, or to shout about . Concierge is excellent and helpful. Close to Penn Station about 600 meters away . We did not take breakfast in the hotel and cannot make any comments on it.We had lunch and dinners in China Town and Little Italy, prices are reasonable and foods are excellent. Check with the locals there for restaurants recommendations and eat like locals, you never go wrong.

title: Very nice hotel
text: Stayed here for 2 nights in November, and it was really pleasant! The hotel is ideally located, really close to Times Square! The room was small but nice and clean, like all areas of the hotel. They have a fitness center, which I used and found it really good. All the staff was nice and helpful, so they made my stay even more enjoyable! Thank you!

title: Enjoyed our stay
text: Our visit to NY was to celebrate some special birthdays there were 12 ladies.  The staff were always very pleasant and extremely helpful giving directions and sorting out internet connections.  The rooms were very clean and the towels changed every day.

title: Great Stay
text: Conveniently located to the subway and Times Square, this hotel is a great choice. The staff was very professional and cordial to me and my family. Our room was very clean and bigger than most I have experienced in New York City. A special thanks to Mario, a great bartender and the superb housekeeping staff.

title: Good location with great service
text: We spent 5 nights at this hotel and the rooms were clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the bistro and Mario was great, also when we checked out Alex was very helpful getting us loaded into our car and sending us on our way! Thank you and we will certainly be back!!

title: Quick stay, great service
text: We were only there for two days, one night and wanted something convenient to the Theater District but not in the heart of the Times Square madness.  This was perfect. It was also close to the Hell's Kitchen area, which is where we ate both our dinners. Since there were four of us, we needed two rooms and wanted them next to each other. Because we would have to wait an hour upon check-in to get this (we had requested it when booking), they gave us free breakfast vouchers. I thought that was a very nice touch as we had showed up right at the check-in time and were happy to leave our bags and explore. Everyone at the hotel was extremely nice. The breakfast worked differently than were were used to, and they were very pleasant and patient explaining it. Also, due to our dinner running long on our last day, we were in an extreme rush to pick-up our bags they were holding, the porter really came through for us!

title: Très bonne situation
text:
Hôtel très bien situé proche de Time Square. Accueil très agréable et sympathique. Les chambres sont suffisamment grandes pour 4 personnes . Les matelas sont très confortables et le ménage irréprochable.
L'équipe est dynamique et est disponible par contre ne parle pas du tout le Français.

title: Good location
text: We stayed 3 nights at this hotel. The location was great and was nearby everywhere. The room was clean and quiet except the external noise that we did not stay at the higher floor. The staff service was good overall except one guy working at the front desk. His approach and attitude was not friendly at all and only starred at his computer all the time when I passed by. Amber working at the concierge desk was very friendly and helpful. Thanks you, Amber for every tips from subway, direction and medical clinic.

title: Merveilleux
text:
Très bel hotel magnifiquement placé près de Times Square (5 minutes à pied) sans en subir les inconvénients du bruit. Les personnel est adorable : A l'accueil des personnes agréables gentilles serviables et très compétentes. On a l'impression d'être des VIP, leurs seuls clients. Marvin particulièrement. Les femmes de ménages sont très consciencieuses et très gentilles ainsi que le voiturier très gentil et compétent. 
Par contre seul gros bémol la concierge qui arrive en retard, qu'on a l'impression de déranger quelle que soit le moment, incapable de nous aider (  heureusement pour nous il y avait le web,  les cartes de paiements et notre anglais approximatif). Elle a même été jusqu'à nous demander d'appeler notre compagnie aérienne nous même car elle ne connaissait pas le numéro.

title: Decent mid-town location, quiet stay
text: I had a decent one night stay at this Courtyard.  The room was typical size for NYC with a large ensuite. I stayed on a higher floor so the external noise was limited and interior noise non-existent.  Wi-fi is included in room, as is breakfast. Staff were great upon check in. I would definitely stay again.

title: Altamente recomendable
text: Una excelente opción calidad precio en NYC. Hotel nuevo, instalaciones perfectas, habitaciones amplias y cómodas, baño amplio. La limpieza impecable y la conexión de wifi funcionó perfecto. Muy central, cerca de todo. El personal muy atento y sirven un desayuno (pagado) que no es caro y es bastante bueno

title: Céntrico y cómodo.
text: Un hotel cómodo, accesible en precios y cerca de lugares relevantes, Empire State Penn Station, Times Square. Muy bien atendido, todo pulcro, todo funciona y está en buen estado, agradable el personal en la recepción, te ayuda en todo.

title: Comfortable hotel in midtown NY
text: I travel on business to midtown NY occasionally and I'm always looking for a reasonably priced and comfortable hotel. I enjoyed my stay here - room was small (as all NY hotel rooms are) but big enough for me. The hotel had a decent lounge and sitting area as well. I didn't use the fitness center this time but hope to in the future. Reception staff was very friendly.

title: Great location
text: I loved this location. I stay at courtyards frequently and this one did not disappoint. It's right off times Square near all the major train line access. The people I had with me have never been to a major metro area so being able to stay someplace thay was easy to shoe them how to get back to was key. Rooms are beautiful, small, but typical for Manhattan.

title: Best hotel stay ever
text:
My girlfriend and I just got back from a 10-day stay in NYC.
We stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Times Square West (room 803).
The room was absolutely spotless and overlooked the street and every single employee we encountered was full of smiles, good humor, and ready to help.

I wish I could remember all the names of the people who helped us, but the only one I can recall was the porter, Angel, who hailed us a cab and then helped us with the luggage when we checked out, but he was only one of an awesome staff. 

The closest thing I could find to a complaint was that I'd have preferred the shower pressure to be a bit stronger, but it wasn't bad as it was. Also, of the multiple AC and USB outlets in the room (4 USB outlets, 1 on each side of the bed on 2 on the desk), the AC outlet (on the left side of the bed) didn't work, fortunately we had at least 7 others to work with.

My kudos to the management and staff for such a relaxing stay. We will definitely be back again!

title: Great hotel for a short stay in the big city
text: The hotel is small but very well maintained. I traveled alone and for a couple of nights. The room is not big but larger than many european hotels. It has all necessary and super clean with nice king bed. I'd asked for a higher floor to avoid the city noise at night I have to wait for my room but it was better. The have also a very good app to check in and receive messages. The location is OK but you are near to the sub and train sation. I will come back.

title: very comfy bed and lovely staff
text:
we had a king size bed that was so comfy and massive we slept really well. (probably could have slept on a concrete floor though - we were so tired after walking all day!) New York is super noisy but with the double glazed windows and a room at the back (and once we unplugged the fridge) it was quiet. Our room was dark but that didnt matter, we only slept there. We went out for breakfast everyday, cheapest diner nearby is Andrew's coffee shop, best diner is Westway diner, but it's a bit further.
We got this hotel for a bargain price so felt it was really posh with a large room and clean and deluxe!

title: Very nice Hotel
text:
This place is at 8th Avenue and 37th street,  8 blocks from Time Square.  We stayed on the 25th floor.  Did not have a great view.
The room was small, the bed was very comfortable, the bathroom fixtures looked brand new.  The staff was very helpful.   They let us store our luggage until the room was ready. Due to lack of time we  did not take advantage of any amenities.  The breakfast was pricey, 2 bowls of oatmeal and 2 cups of coffee, tip and tax  $22.00.  A Dunkin Donut is a 1/2 block away.

title: Small room but very nice
text: Very satisfied, but only complaint was the price of food in their cafe. $10.25 for an egg sandwich on a muffin. I know this is New York, but most Courtyards have free breakfast. Several other choices to eat outside of the hotel very close.

title: Ttes bien
text: Belle chambre très bonne literie . Sdb àvec baignoire. Notre chambre donnait sur la rue mais aucun bruit perceptible, très bonne isolation . Mixe d'un petit dej à la française et américaine. Ne manquait que les pancakes. Dommage car on a demandé mais l'hôtel n'en proposait pas. Mais c'est le seul bémol et c'est un détail. Ttes bien situé aussi.

title: Exceptional staff, clean and centrally located hotel
text: Stayed for a week, the room was nice and clean. Hotel is centrally located, near subway station, Times Square and the Theater district.  The staff was exceptional, especially Julieth who made my stay a very pleasant one when she found out that it was my first time to visit the city.

title: Excelente opção
text:
O hotel é muito bom. 
Bom custo benefício. 
O quarto é bem confortável e os funcionários são muito gentis.
Conseguimos um earlier check in e late check out sem custo adicional.
Há um pequeno restaurante para café da manhã e refeições rápidas sem grande luxo mas que atende bem.
Valeu a escolha e certamente nos hospedariamos nele novamente.

title: Fair price for quality and services
text:
I spent 1 week with my daughter at this hotel. It is a good option to stay in Manhattan. Probable not the best, but an acceptable one. 
Hotel is situated in a good area in term of location (close to Times Square, Bryant Park, 5th Avenue, Broadway, Macy's). It is also close to Port Authority and Penn Station. So, if you want to save money with the taxi from airport to Manhattan, you can take the bus to Port Authority or train to Penn Station. From here, you will have a 5-10 minutes walking distance to the hotel
The advantage to be near those points that help you to save taxi money is compensated by the dirty area around the hotel. Some big bags of garbage, on the street near hotel could not be the first impression that you want :). 
But the hotel is clean. The bathroom is clean and modern. The room is large enough to not requesting gymnast capabilities to move in the room. We know rooms in Manhattan hotels are very small. This one is acceptable. 
People on the reception and concierge are nice. 
You can use their offer for breakfast. 5 USD per person. It is enough to start the day and less expansive than a breakfast in the city. 
Do not use the concierge for Broadway theatres booking. It charge additional 40 usd for bringing the tickets in the hotel. 
Use the concierge to book transfer to airport if tou need. They found me a good option
The gym room is nice and offer enough possibilities. And it is open 24/24
The hotel is a good option to stay if balance area, costs and services.

title: Super hôtel !
text: L'emplacement est idéal, à 10 minutes de Times Square. L'hôtel est propre, chambre petite mais très bonne literie.  Nous avons du quitter précipitamment l'hôtel après seulement 2 nuits au lieu de 8. La jeune femme a l'accueil à été très compréhensive et nous avons été remboursées peu de temps après alors que nous n'avions pas d'assurance annulation. Très beau geste de la part de cet hôtel que je recommande vivement.

title: Zeta Tours reviews Courtyard Manhattan Times Square West
text: The title is a bit misleading as the hotel is actually 5 blocks south and one long block west of Times Square, but it is close enough! Located in the "Garment District" of New York and actually only three blocks from Penn Station so it is convenient. The rooms are not large it is New York after all but they are very comfortable, Popular with foreign tourists The breakfast room is quite good and although the service is good, the menu for dinner is limited . DIY laundry services are available for $10. All mod cons available. Staff friendly and welcoming

title: Good staff and clean
text: Nice rooms clean. Good location for grabbing subway, centrally located for most popular things to see in New York.  Concierge staff very helpful on finding tickets for events.  Only down thing  is no view from room, but really was only there to sleep

title: Excellent!
text: Très bonne hôtel ! Un peu chere mais vous êtes à 5 min à pieds de Times Square. Wifi parfait et rapide dans les chambres, chambres spacieuses et très propre. Salle de bain au top. Je recommande cet établissement

title: Settimana a Ny
text:
Hotel rinnovato internamente
Camera di dimensioni piccole per due persone e relativi bagagli ma con tutto il necessario e soprattutto pulita.

Colazione possibile al bar a pianterreno a prezzi di NY..

Posizione buona vicina a time square e a 5minuti a piedi dalla metropolitana 

Prezzo in linea con pari hotel di NY

title: Outstanding
text: The recently redone facility was outstanding, the staff was outstanding, Chris was outstanding, cleanliness was outstanding.  One of the best experiences I have had at a Marriott Courtyard in a long time and I travel a lot.

title: Impecável!
text: Tudo certo com as reservas, local limpo, WC ótimo, lobby legal e equipe simpática! Hotel novo e tudo funcionando bem! Voltaremos com certeza! Sem falar na localização, estamos fazendo tudo à pé! O café do bistrô ainda tem de quebra produtos do Starbucks!

title: Bare Essentials
text:
This Courtyard is a very basic facility. I found the rooms to be dated and poorly noise insulated. As a base I used for a business trip it didn't offer a restful environment and hence not a future option for me if I can avoid it. 

If I had to stay - I would insist on a room not on East 40th as it is particularly noisy very late night / very early morning. 

On the flip side - The hotel is very convenient location-wise. Easy walk to down town / Time Square & other landmarks so if you aren't a light sleeper and interested in seeing the city - probably a good option for you.

title: Otimo !!
text: Bem localizado , ótimo atendimento, quarto com bom tamanho para os padrões de NY,escolha opcao com cafe da manha facilita muito e é super honesto servido na cafeteira . Um especial agradecimento ao Chris que conseguiu uma limosine para nos levar para o JFK com o mesmo valor de um transporte comum! Foi uma surpresa ótima para terminar nossa estadia em NY

title: Una truffa
text: Abbiamo soggiornato qui 5 notti con il mio ragazzo ed una coppia di amici. L'albergo è centralissimo e anche molto bello, unica enorme pecca: ci hanno bloccato 1100 euro in più dell'intero importo sulla carta di credito e ad oggi non solo non ce li hanno sbloccati, ma sostengono di non averli mai bloccati. Insomma in totale un soggiorno che doveva costarci 2000 euro totali ci sta costando ben 3100, e stiamo ancora cercando di farci riaccreditare questa somma che ci è stata letteralmente addebitata immotivatamente, telefonando a banche e alberghi. Sconsigliatissimo! Un consiglio per gli alberghi in America: pagate al momento del check in e date la cauzione in contanti. Sono dei truffatori!

title: Excelente servicio, excelentes instalaciones
text: Un hotel estupendo.  Muy buena ubicación,  en una zona tranquila y con todos los servicios.  Destacar la amabilidad del personal y la disposición para ayudarte.  Muy por encima de la media de los hoteles de NY

title: Otimo custo beneficio
text:
Hotel muito agradável, o apartamento não é muito grande mas acomoda duas pessoas tranquilamente.
A localização desse hotel é muito boa, pois esta longe das aglomerações porém fica a três quadras da Times.
Não tem café da manha, porém na esquina temos um Dunkin Dunts e vários restaurantes.
Me hospedaria novamente, sem nenhum problema.

title: Angels do exist!
text: This hotel has a special place in my heart and will be a frequently visited hotel anytime that I go to NYC.  My husband and I found ourselves in NYC on an emergency situation with family.  The front desk staff, I believe his name was Bryan, was incredibly helpful.  He was a bright spot in our unfortunate trip.  This hotel went above and beyond putting themselves in my husband and I's shoes. They showed that kindness from strangers still exists and I can not thank them enough for that. The room was comfortable and the amenity of the downstairs Bistro was nice for when you realize you may have forgotten to eat.  A HUGE thank you to this hotel and all of their staff!!!!!

title: The location is the best aspect
text:
I stayed four nights at this hotel. The location and price is good however I would say it had a budget feel with very small rooms. The first room I was given was on the 4th floor at the rear of the hotel. I asked to move as it was incredibly noisy due to the air con units bring situated outside. I would recommend therefore a higher floor. Once moved to the 11th the noise was far better. The bedrooms are quite dated and rather dull with very beige and brown fittings and not much brightness. They are in good order however the sheets and towels never felt that fresh. The bathroom was better decorated and felt more modern than the bedroom. The aircon is also quite noisy. 
Overall, as I say it's an OK hotel of you have a budget, all hotels in NYC are over priced. I would despite the above, stay again as the location, staff and price make it all very convenient. I'd say just don't expect too much.

title: our 5 day visit nyc
text: the hotel was perfect ,nice and clean perfect location staff were very friendly would definetly stay there again we had a room with 2 x doubles wasnt cramped with 4 of us and everything is walkable macys empire state central park time sq ...the only downside was the bar was a little expensive

title: great location and great hotel
text:
the hotel located right on the times square and right next to a subway station (like a min walk) and there is a big Duane Reade (which i found as a great advantage). 
The stuff in very nice, threre is a coffe house in the hotel so you can get breakfast or take TA and start your day. 
The rooms are clean, big, the bed is very comfortable and the shower is great!!

title: We stayed there before and it continues to be excellent
text: First, and foremost, the staff were terrific to us; something you do not always find in New York. One young man, Chris, helped us with a luggage and was terrific. We visit NYC several times a year to visit our grandchildren. We have stayed at this Courtyard several times and always have had good luck. The air conditioning works well in their rooms; again not always the case in NYC. The rooms also are good size. The hotel is located on 37th and 8th, convenient to the subway and Penn Station as well as Time Square.

title: Mycket bra läge!
text:
Hotellet har ett mycket bra läge bara ett par kvarter från Pennsylvania Station, Port authority Bus terminal och Times Square.
Rummen är mycket tysta och de är fräscha men inte jättestora.
Trevlig och hjälpsam personal. Kan absolut rekommendera hotellet!

title: Klein maar fijn
text: Niet al te groot hotel midden in Times Square. Kleine mooie schone kamers helaas geen al te fraai uitzicht maar hé New York beleef je buiten dus " who gives a f....! Zeer hulpvaardig personeel die je kunnen vertellen waar je zijn moet voor een goed ontbijt(is ook mogelijk in het hotel maar ik beveel aan om een van de vele diners of deli's te bezoeken)diner of wat te zien. In het hotel bestaat de mogelijkheid om tickets voor shows of wat al niet meer te regelen. Al met al een goede uitvalsbasis om de " Big Apple" te beleven. Have fun.

title: Great Location
text:
Great location for getting round Manhattan.  Hells kitchen area loved it would stay again.  Only downside breakfast area not big enough for hotel.

Double room with 2 beds nice size and clean.

Sky room bar worth a visit.

title: Great location and comfortable hotel and excellent value for Manhattan
text:
Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West is centrally located and hotel room was very clean and modern as well as quiet and quite large particularly for NY. 

We had a great sleep most nights and thought the hotel was pretty good value for Manhattan. 

We were there as a couple and didn't require use of the bar etc which appeared to have limited opening times, but the hotel was very good and comfortable base for sight seeing.

It had been refurbished recently and the room was very clean and tidy.

Plenty of cafes and restaurants nearby, as well as shops for fresh sandwiches and snacks etc. 

Would stay there again, and would definitely recommend staying there.

title: "For a quick business trip in NYC"
text: King room was Very Clean, the cost was an affordable rate, the hotel has a 24 hour gym, Front desk clerks were very friendly staff and offered assistance when necessary, good location near shopping eating etc, Hotel sits quietly, if possible in NYC!

title: Great Value and Location, ideal for our 11 days in NYC
text:
You get what you pay for in NYC. At around $300 per night this place was a little small but in a great location close to Penn Station and Times Square. Our room on the 26th floor had a view of the Empire State Building (cool colours at night).

Bistro downstairs and options from Market (snack food) in foyer pretty limited, but it's not a 5 star hotel, just be prepared to eat out.

Lifts are fast, so don't let a higher floor put you off, much better than grubby ground level area. We were happy we could not see sidewalk. NY trash piles up every day in this area as there are no alleys / bins for rubbish.

Staff were very accommodating, friendly and informative during our stay. Bed was firm for me but large and shower was fine in a smallish bathroom.

NYC is not about staying in your room, I think we did 185,000 steps during our stay. The Courtyard was a great place to rest ready for the next day.

As with most of NY, 7/11 is 100m away as are Deli's, Conv stores, Dunkin Donuts, Bakeries, heaps of food options very close by.

At 60% of the rate of the big brother Marriott Marquis it was great value.

title: Weekend in NY
text: Stayed at this hotel for the weekend. For a NY hotel it is spacious, clean and  the location is very convenient. Had breakfast at the Bistro... as usual, Bistro food is nothing to write home about but it was decent and served the purpose. The hotel staff is friendly and professional. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Stayed 5 nights in NYC
text: Great hotel. Service was great and Starbuck next door to the left and a great breakfast deli to the right. Located right at 40th an 5th street this hotel was in the middle of everything. Walking distance etc.

title: 뉴욕호텔
text: 방은 작았지만 소규모 냉장고가 있어 좋았습니다 화장실도 깨끗했구요. 다만 바디크린저는 없었네요

title: Dependable and convenient... not always a great value
text:
Not all Marriott Courtyard hotels are updated but this one is. I travel for business and have stayed at this property 10 times in the last year. Never had a bad experience and it's been very dependable and convenient. 

There is a small Starbucks café but it's pricey and limited selection. The Fresh & Co or other breakfast spots within 5 min walking are better values.

Rooms and beds are middle of the road... nothing fancy but decent. Big desk (especially for NYC) - what you'd expect from a business traveler focused hotel.

VERY convenient to midtown NYC. Steps from Penn Station, Empire State Building and a few blocks to Times Square.

title: Great Stay
text: I think that the hotel stay beginsafe at the front desk. The staff was courteous, friendly and professional.  The rooms are clean and larger than most Manhattan rooms at comparable hotels. The location is very convenient to local attractions. We had events to attend in Queens..access to freeways was fairly easy by New York standards. Booking well in advance yields the best rates. We will definitely stay here again

title: Heerlijk, niet te groot hotel op centrale plek in New York. Dicht bij station Penn en times square.
text: Mooie kamers. Niet gehorig en erg goede bedden. Zeker een aanrader!!! Personeel is vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Service in boardingpasses of andere tickets uit te printen. Happy hour van 17.00 - 18.30 uur!

title: Great location for Broadway!
text:
The hotel is pleasant. Nothing amazing but basic needs are met. Good size rooms. Nice bathrooms.

Great location for Broadway. I saw two shows and walked home alone from both at 11pm. Not worried.  Streets were busy and lit near Times Square and busy enough to get to the hotel with no issue.

title: Practical
text: Nice hotel with good enough service that won't disappoint. In a good location close to Times Square it's not expensive. You get what you payed for, adequate and practical. No luxury but clean and comfortable. Breakfast is Starbucks like.

title: Ras
text: Comme le dit le titre bon hotel bon emplassement bon service. Seul manque une baignoire pour soulager les jambes apres 20km de marche quoitidienne et un petit dej specialement pour les clients de l hotel mais ce qui est propose est deja bien

title: best value for this price
text: The hotel has good position ..near to Time square; Empire State Building;... it is a few minutes walk from Panne station ...metro  station to which you have a direct line from airport bus if you want to avoid crowds on new yorks streets coming in town by plane from JFK....cca 45 minutes ride. So probably the cheapest and fastest way to coming in town. (5 USD for airport train and a metro ticket). Rooms are clean and quiet. Stuff is friendly, position is good if you want to stay near some of main city attractions...so daintily highly recommended place.

title: 5 amazing nights
text:
My family had never been to New York, so we drove from Toronto Canada and stayed for 5 nights.  The service at this hotel couldn't have been better.  From finding parking, to directions, to the cafe.  Every person that we talked to that worked at this hotel was super nice.
There were a couple of reasons we stayed at this hotel.  First is because they had queen sized beds.  We much prefer to sleep on queen size beds as opposed to doubles.  Helped us sleep very comfortably.  And the location was fantastic.  Close enough to the action, but far enough for a break from the action.  Perfect location for us.
Although Manhattan is a noisy city, we did not here any noise from outside while we were in the room.

I would like to send a special shout out to Vincent at the front desk, who is simply a really nice guy.  A pleasure to speak to and very helpful.  Vincent, you are awesome!

I would also like to send a special shout out to the morning cafe manager.  I'm sorry I didn't catch her name, but she is super efficient, and handles that cafe superbly.  She's also very nice.  The food was great and we had quick breakfasts before heading out.  Thank you Cafe manager!  Sorry I didn't catch your name.

All in all, this hotel helped make our experience in Manhattan a great one.  Highly recommend this hotel.

And once again, thank you to all the wonderful employees at the hotel!  Keep up the great work!!

Sincerely,

Ira

title: excelente estadía
text:
Hotel nuevo, muy buena limpieza, habitación confortable, cuenta con teléfono, tv, aire acondicionado, wifi de excelente velocidad, heladera, y set para preparar café, el servicio de desayuno que ofrece se toma en planta baja es pago, en la habitación que estuve había bañera, lo cual estaba bueno xq uno se podía hacer un baño de inmersión para descongestionar los pies luego de las caminatas por Nueva York.
Hay computadoras con impresoras en la planta baja, y hay que solicitar la contraseña al recepcionista que gentilmente te la otorga.
Ofrecen servicio de excursiones, que se contratan en la planta baja.
Está ubicado a media cuadra de la 8va avenida y a solo 3  cuadras de la estación Penn Station desde donde salen los distintos ramales de trenes y subtes, y tambien esta a pocas cuadras de Times Square y de la estación de buses ubicada en la 8va avenida y 43.

title: Family Trip
text: Overall the hotel was clean and offered a fine hotel experience.  The staff was accommodating and gave some good advice on local eateries.  Food at the hotel was a matter all its own.  While I understand that food is expensive in NYC... $5 for a small Gatorade is rediculous.  The onsite breakfast choice was not very good and $15 for a small egg and cheese sandwich sums it up.

title: Left a bad taste but is a good place to stay
text:
Stayed here a few times. Good location for Penn and rooms satisfy all needs.
Reception is friendly too and I recall the gym and breakfast are passable.
The roof is nice too but as ever, the service still stinks. Nothing is done to fix this and despite wanting to provide feedback, no one ever contacted me.
Good location to Penn and rest of Manhattan. I like it here but I wish they would take suggestions seriously. It strikes me that this place thinks that by putting chocolate and water in the room to say sorry, makes all better..i want to see improvements next time am back, not freebies every time something goes wrong.

Recommended but seriously, they need to take note of customer complaints...nothing ever improves here.

title: 非常不錯的地點但住宿品質有進步空間
text:
上次造訪紐約在這飯店住了將近10晚
地方非常不錯
附近有多條捷運
火車站及長途巴士站都在步行5分鐘的距離
時代廣場及城中區都在附近
地點是無可挑剔

但住宿品質並不十分理想
房間隔音不佳
每天早上5點左右垃圾車搬運聲真是令人抓狂
走道腳步聲也聽得一清二楚
房間大小並不充裕但衛浴還不錯

總體而言
如果你能訂到不錯的價格入住
是個可以考慮選擇的飯店

title: Rooms so small, terrible sheets and poor service for Gold members
text:
Sheets were so scratchy they kept us awake all night. Pilled and so worn they should've been trashed years ago. Honestly haven't had such poor sleep quality since I was a kid staying in a cheap beach motel. 
Told them I was a Gold member during check in but was put on a low floor near the elevator. No breakfast for Gold members, either (this contrasts to the amazing service at other Marriotts by far). 
Rooms small even by NYC standards. Would not recommend.

title: Great location and good value for money
text:
Location is key in NYC, even though you can get almost anywhere by subway/bus/taxi or even just walking, because time is money when you're trying to squeeze in a museu visit, nice dinner and a broadway show or trying to find something fun to do at night after your busy day of meetings.  If you can get back to your hotel in between your busy itinerary in the city, you can rest/regroup/change clothes and thats worth a lot in my opinion.  But of course it might cost you a lot to be in the middle of Times Square or Central Park.

So this Courtyard in Times Square West (Times Square is 10-15 min walk away) is a good balance of being close to things, but not so close that you're paying a premium in terms of price.  The hotel is very clean and spacious (for NYC) and the staff are friendly (again, for NYC).  There is a downstairs shop for coffee and breakfast on the go.  Location is such that you can walk to the Javits conf center, Penn Station (key if you came by Amtrak), or Megabus dropoff & pickup spot.

title: Perfect for Business in NYC
text: This hotel is very suitable for Business, and it has big rooms compared for what you can get in NYC. It is perfect, modern, comfortable and well located. Pretty close to Pen Station so you can go around NYC in minutes.

title: Average NY hotel
text:
I stayed in a twin queen room. The check in was straight forward and staff at the desk were efficient and friendly. They took the time to explain the hotel basics. The hotel lobby and public areas were very clean and well presented. There is also a very small shop for basics in the lobby.
The rooms are small. The bathroom is tight. It included a tub/shower, toilet and one sink/basin. In these small bathrooms I wish they would ditch the tub to make more space. Amenities are very basic - no shower cap or dryer was provided. 
I found the beds to be very uncomfortable. Not sure why but I didn't sleep well and woke up battered every morning. Maybe they were too soft?? The desk chair dent really match the desk. The lighting was a little poor.
But hey, I am in New York and the location is pretty good. 
The air-conditioning unit is a wall mounted device in the room. It is very noisy and blows quite a bit of air around. So whilst it was effective at cooling the room, we had to turn it off when we were in the room.
I also found the food and bar concept a little underwhelming. Breakfast is "starbucks" style. They do eggs or waffles to order, otherwise everything else is from the fridge or counter. I tried the eggs one day and they were very average. Next day I just did a cup of fruit. The bar/restaurant area opens in the evening at around 5pm. It was every quiet. I was extremely underwhelmed by the bar experience. The barman just wanted to be somewhere else. He clearly hates his job. He was completely uninterested. Then a G&T was $17.50. I guess they make no effort because there are so many options around the area that the hotel has just given up. But I am also not sure if this is a chicken or an egg issue. I wanted to sit downstairs, work and have aa drink but after the first night I gave up. 
Overall I was left a little underwhelmed. But the hotel was reasonably priced and in a good location. Probably ok for a short stay.

title: Perfect hotel
text: Een zeer goed hotel, zeer centraal gelegen. Hygiëne op en top. Hotel ligt perfect voor een bezoek aan New York. De metro op loopafstand en alles kun je prima vanuit dit hotel bezoeken. Ruime kamers, heerlijke bedden, precies wat je nodig hebt na een drukke dag in New York.

title: Excelente escolha.
text: Boa localização, próximo ao metrô. Próximo de restaurantes, teatro, cafés e bares. caixa eletrônico. Atendimento excelente. Próximo a Macys e Time square. Acomodações excelentes, restaurante oferece café da manhã, mas é pago.

title: "Great location and very clean "
text: This hotel has a great location. The staff was excellent and very friendly and also very helpful to my family.  Our room and all areas were spotless. Great walking distance to everything. Great restaurants and shopping nearby. As we were leaving we asked the front desk to get us a cab and there was a car waiting. Would recommend this hotel highly and we will stay here again.

title: Fantastic stay
text:
My friend & I stayed here for 8 nights & couldn't fault it at all.  Our room & all communal areas were spotless, staff were very helpful & the location was great. We only ate breakfast in the restaurant on one morning but it was good value for money & the staff were very accommodating to our special requirements.  

We had a fantastic stay, keep up the good work!

title: Ottimo hotel
text: Ottimo hotel, molto pulito, il personale è cortese e sempre disponibile per qualsiasi cosa. Abbiamo soggiornato per 9 notti senza mai avere un problema. Molto vicino alla metro e molto comodo al centro; in 10 minuti a piedi si raggiunge Time Square, il Madison Square Garden lo si raggiunge in pochi minuti a piedi. Noi eravamo al terzo piano, con vista all'interno dell'hotel quindi malgrado fossimo cosi bassi abbiamo dormito tranquillamente senza sentire rumori. Sicuramente se mai dovessi tornare a New York soggiornerei in questo hotel, lo consiglio vivamente.

title: One of the worst 4-star hotel I stayed in
text:
Hello,
We are a couple that was doing a trip through multiple US location. We've arrived to NYC after a wonderful hotel that we stayed in Miami.
We were greatly surprised by the low standards of the Marriott's courtyard Times Square west. Besides the great visuals and design it has nothing good in it, more than that, I don't think it should be a 4-star hotel and definitely not a top tier 4-star.
So let's start:

The good:
1. Great design

The bad:
1. We had a connecting door to other room

2. The room is small for a couple, no comfort when it's so small and you don't have enough free space for two people and baggage

3. The water stream in the bath is static and cannot be changed, only the water temperature is changeable.

4. The bath separator looks cheap, just ordinary material, not a glass like in high end hotels

5. There is no breakfast(or so we have been told by the staff), if you want you can order from a menu, however there is no active restaurant in the hotel between 10:30am-5pm , it fells like a 2 or 3 stars hotel when you are hungry and need to go out to eat because the restaurant is closed in the middle of the day.

6. The air conditioner is a garbage, a cheap one and when you switch to heat it releases at first very stinking air which stays in the room for a lot of time, and the staff says it's ok because no one uses A/C on heat in the summer so it wasn't prepared for this.

Think twice before staying in this low-end expensive hotel and don't buy all the "great design" reviews because at the end you need great room and service, not only good visuals.

title: Not worth it. Total Disappointment
text:
The room is small for couple.
We got room with connecting door- we didnt want it. hear every noise from the rooms near us. Also Noise from the streets.
The AC is old and poor. 
The USB device in one side of the bad doesnt work. 
Poor Wifi.
Filthy carpet. 
The bathroom small and inconvinient. Very bad water stream so its Difficult to take shower. Flood in the bath and leakage from the small tap in it.
 Poor Amenities for the price we paid. 
Very disappointed.

title: Good location, and clean
text:
Great location, within good walking distance of Times Square and even Central Park, if you don't mind a good walk.  Lots of shopping and restaurants nearby.  
Lobby is nice, with a bar/cafe area for breakfast and happy hour and light eats for dinner.  Unfortunately it's not open during the mid afternoon but there are snacks/drinks for purchase near the checkin desk.
Room was clean and nicely laid out - not as much of a shoebox as some other hotels in NYC, but it is compact.  
Overall a very good and reasonably priced hotel.

title: Boa opção
text:
Um bom hotel. 
Com ótima localização, muito perto de metrô, atrações, cafés, bares e restaurantes. 
Atendimento atencioso por parte da recepção. Limpeza e ótima rede de internet wifi. 
Café da manhã não incluso na diária, e preços altos, por isso a melhor opção é sair e comer fora ao estilo americano.

title: Atitude at Check In. Front desk did not anticipate needs nor were they accomodating with deposit
text:
Check In 3:30pm
- Prepaid room
- asked for reduced cash deposit for 1 night stay
- Mgr declined and wouldn't let me check in to my Paid room until Midnight!?!?  EIGHT HOURS LATER

Mgmt & FD lack hotel business acumen
- incapable of managing deposit policy and when to lake exceptions for unforeseen circumstances 

- never anticipated guest needs and made me wait EIGHT HOURS before checking into my room

(Deposit policy is designed for people who pose a liability.....I'm a 41 yr old asian lady traveling for business.....my nephew can make better assessments and identify when there is no liability in comparison to the obvious opportunity to exhibit hospitality and be "accommodating" by accepting a lowered deposit and get praised for going the extra mile.

- Not Yelissa (who was texting at the desk most of the time)
- Yelissa had no qualms about making a guest who pays her salary wait 8 hours.

- this was my first and last stay at this hotel group

Found dead bug in sheets.

title: Muito bom!
text: Hotel super bem localizado, bem próximo ao metrô, à Times Square e Macys. O atendimento é muito bom, todos muito atenciosos e o quarto é amplo e bem confortável. Não tomamos café da manhã no hotel (acho que tinha essa opção), porque tem diversos mercadinhos e restaurantes por perto (tem um restaurante tailandês muito maravilhoso quase na esquina).

title: A great layover
text: I was coming back from an overseas trip and thought I would spend a day or so in the Big Apple before getting a flight home.  The hotel was great.  I got a super rate - under $100.  I showed up hours before check-in and they had a room ready for me.  The staff was great.  The concierge gave me some good ideas and directions on things to do.  The front desk was friendly.  Since I was heading to and from JFK, the location was good because it was just a few blocks from Penn Station.  The NY pizza place around the corner was a bonus.

title: Nice location, wuiet
text: This hotel is a short 10 min walk drone Penn Station, Times Square, Macy's and the Convention center. Great restaurants nearby, and easy access to the subway. Rooms a a little small, but very modern, quiet and the staff is great. There is a cafe on site, which doubles as a bar at happy hour.

title: Awesome housekeeping service
text: The front desk staff were "ok".  Housekeeping was wonderful.  I left an entire drawer of items that had been turned in and were mailed to me right away.  I was very appreciative- Rooms are HUGE for NYC standards.  I have stayed at much pricier hotels and had a tiny room.  These were very roomy, comfortable, and quiet.  The hotel is updated (despite being an older building). Furnishings are not dated or worn.  Such a deal I hate to let it get out!

title: Convenient Location & Great Stay
text: My standards for a hotel room are simple: A clean & spotless room, reasonable wifi, fair price, and service that makes me feel like a human being. Courtyard at Manhattan/Times Square West nailed all of those standards and then some. The room we got was clean in every way, the wifi actually worked with surprisingly reasonable speeds, and the front desk was nothing less than professional during our stay. The only disappointment, if it could be one, is that it appeared that their Starbucks bar did not have any iced tea as a standard drink, which is a bummer because Starbucks' Iced Tea is what gives me hope. But even with that minor disappointment, everything else was so perfect that this Courtyard gets five stars for sure.

title: offer is limited
text:
Nice hotel with very friendly staff; located around 15` from Theatre area and times square. 
Room are very small, amenities are very limited, even no shower gel. 
No free coffee available in the lobby 
If in your package the breakfast is included, be ready to have a very limited offer and leave being hungry. Better to stay in an Hampton inn in the same budget range

title: Diamond in the rough
text:
I have to say I was a bit skeptical as the taxi approached the area where this hotel was. But being directly between Penn Station and the bus station, I understand the area and the challenges. I've occasionally run into areas like this in Europe near the stations and it's an absolute pleasure to find a hotel of this quality in an otherwise "sketchy" area. The staff was very hospitable and the hotel spotless, despite the rough weather when I stayed with them. Time Square is just a short walk away, I could connect with just about anything a couple of blocks away at Penn Station, and the price was absolutely right for Manhattan, I saved quite a bit and didn't sacrifice a thing (except I was just a bit too close to Justin Bieber than I ever cared to be...a couple of blocks to Madison Square Garden.)

I would recommend finding another place to have breakfast than the hotel, however. Spent $25 for eggs, bacon, and toast, orange juice, and iced tea. if I hadn't been meeting colleagues there for breakfast, I would have just taken a hop to Starbucks and had a better breakfast for a third the price.

title: NYC Visit
text: Good location near Time Square with nice rooms and friendly staff.  Free Wi-Fi, dining and bar with outside area to eat, and easily accessible computers to use with printer.  Hotel is sits at 37th Ave and 8th

title: Better than expected!
text: I stayed here for 2 nights with my husband. Staff was extremely nice, room was spotless, and location was perfect for the price. We were able to walk most places we wanted to go, and all others were a short subway ride away. Definitely recommend!

title: Gave away room
text: We were set for a weekend in NYC for our anniversary, as we got to the airport we were notified that our flight was delayed. We immediately called the hotel, gave them our name and told them we would be in late (2am). The woman on the phone assured us this was no issue and they would hold our room. When we got there after a frustrating day of travel they informed us that they had sold our room and had no place for us. Then shipped us across town for the night- but must change hotels the second night of our two night stay. This is the worst experience we have had after years of staying at Marriott hotels.

title: Perfect location!
text: We were close to everything - shops, Broadway and Times Square. Subway station on the corner. Breakfast with the coupons - three choices. Very safe and quiet stay. Very comfy beds and pillows. Ver good windows - no noise from the street.

title: Nice.
text:
Clean, modern, quiet room. We were very happy with our 4-5 night stay. Great location, close to everything: The metro, Times Square, Broadway, parks, restaurants, shopping, etc. 
The cafe downstairs was very convenient for a quick breakfast or lunch. 
The staff was very kind and accommodating. 
We'd stay there again.

title: Quality hotel and service, not crazy about immediate area
text:
Have stayed at this hotel before and from my viewpoint it is a so so location. Area around hotel is a mixture of older buildings and infrastructure is not the best 

So if you are looking for a luxurious spot, this may not be it.

That said, everything else about hotel is solid. Service was excellent, room good size and comfortable with small refrigerator.

Had room a floor 22 facing rear of hotel and was probably one of the quietest rooms in NYC I've stayed in.

Nice place

title: Nice hotel with perfect location!
text: We stayed here for 8 nights. We got a room on the 12th floor, but the view was right into a office-house. It was ok, we just used the room for sleep anyway. Nice and clean room with comfy beds. Very helpful and nice staff. The breakfast was quite simple, but good coffee and enough for us!

title: Not the best street
text: Stayed here for 5 nights on a business and pleasure mix. Good location lots of restaurants within a 2 block radius. We ate within the 2 blocks and had good food with reasonable prices. There is a Shanghai juicy bun place up the street. There is a Chinese bun place on 38th and 8th ave. Buns are a dollar, right out of the oven in the mornings. Milk tea or coffee also a dollar. Close to times square and a block from blue line subway and a couple more blocks to red line. Rooms are small but do offer 2 queen size beds. AC was noisy as hell. We weren't in the room much. Only big issue for me is it isn't on the nicest street. On the corner there is I think a pot paraphernalia store. Every night there are always some seedy types standing around not doing much. We never got hassled but just seems like a lot of action going on.

title: New York/La Magie
text: Nous sommes près de tout à pied...la chambre très bien et les lits très confortables...Tout à côté nous allions déjeuner avec coupons fournis par l'hôtel, c'était genre une petite épicerie et resto que nous pouvions nous faire faire des oeufs..etc..

title: Publicité mensongère
text:
Nous avons choisi cet hôtel pour son emplacement et pour profiter de la piscine après les journées à arpenter les rues de la grande pomme ne faites pas comme moi ne vous y fiez pas en fait la piscine est la piscine d'un club de sport indépendant de l'hôtel qui accorde un accès à ses clients sauf qu il faut réserver son heure et l'accès n'est pas libre et on est obligatoirement être deux par couloirs de nage .... Ce n'est pas du tout ce que l'on attend d'un hôtel vendu  avec piscine , 
Nous avons dû appeler tous les soirs le service de maintenance car pas d'eau chaude vers 18h .
Les salles de bains commencent à dater quelques joint sont noirs et il y a une odeur de linge mouillé du au rideau en plastic dans la baignoire .... Je ne sais pas si ils le change a chaque client mais je trouve cela pas hygiénique du tout 
Pas de frigo non plus dans les chambre mais possibilité de se faire un café ou the 
Sinon hôtel très bien placé

title: Amazing Location
text: By far the best breakfast we have had in a hotel. They offer Starbucks drinks. The rooms were a good size. Although throughout the whole hotels it feels very humid and sticky, if you don't have the AC on your room will have a strange stench. Make sure to put your do not disturb sign out if you like sleeping in, the cleaners come very early. There are loads of great restaurants around and they are not far away. Times Square is a good 10 minute walk away. The hotel gives free maps and we defiantly used it. Wifi is free and works very well. Very great time in New York. Gym and Laundry are available

title: Nice stay/Buon soggiorno
text:
They gave us a large King Size  Bedroom, since our 2years daughter was with us. Very big bath and shower. extremely clean.
Kind personnel. 
Satisfying breakfast.
Self-service laundry and gym at first floor. 

Ci hanno assegnato una camera più grande (letto King) visto che la nostra bimba di due anni dormiva con noi.
Bagno e doccia estremamente spaziose e tutto molto pulito.
Colazione soddisfacente.
Personale gentile.
Lavanderia self service e palestra al primo piano.

title: Excellent NYC hotel
text: I've stayed in numerous - and more expensive - hotels in NYC, and this is a keeper.  Clean, neat - with a great Bistro for meals or drinks + an unexpected courtyard patio.  The staff is friendly, and this is an absolute value for the city.

title: GREAT SERVICE!
text:
We stayed here for 8 nights. I had never used the subway and really needed help to navigate the city.  Amber, the congierce, was amazing. She was so professional and extremely helpful. She explained which subway line to take, which side of the street to access the subway, and even printed out walking directions to our destinations from the subway location we stopped at!  She looked at all options for service to the airport and then booked our airport shuttle service home.  She was always so kind and very helpful and it made all the difference to our trip.   
The hotel was very nice.  Very clean, nice rooms, laundry facility, computers and printers , and good location.

title: Excellent location
text:
The best place if you are in and out of NY. Two families spent a night there last week. We walked back from Times Square well past 1 am. 
Good coffee machine. Good service.
The security was a bit restless with the noise from our rooms. But I guess many business travelers stay there too.
All in all a worthy hotel.

title: Excellent position, Prfect staff and good value for money
text: We stayed for 4 nights at the hotel, it was our first time to new york, we read some unflattering reviews about this hotel but as soon as we got there we found that this hotel is just perfect starting with the welcoming stuff that arranged our room in few minutes and later assisted us with first tips to visit the city.

title: Small room but great Location
text: Room is very small  - no free bottle water like most other hotel. Great location to Penn Station, Time Square, Empire State etc. 38th street is a garment district. Wish I have more time to explore. Hotel is on 37th Street. Not too far to go to Red Circle Cruise. Moderate bathroom. Clean sheets. Will recommend.  Great Concierge - we got good advice for the 4th July Fireworks on East River.  Will stay when in New York again.

title: Perfect
text: This property is extremely clean, and the staff is accommodating. We stayed here for 3 nights and were not disappointed. If you stay at Courtyards, you know there isn't a free breakfast, but there is a restaurant. The price is great for a hotel in Times Square. Location is perfect! We will stay here again.

title: Buen hotel buena zona feo entorno
text:
El hotel en particular es normal con los servicios básicos aceptables. La zona es complicada y hay que tener cuidado sobre todo si caminas de noche. 
Para ir en solitario esta bien. Creo que el servicio podría mejorar sobre todo con los usuarios élite.

Felicito a las personas de habla hispana.

title: Great Sisters and Daughters trip!!
text: Just returned from NYC, there with my sister and our young adult daughters from June 29-July 3/2016. We were very pleased with the service, location and cleanliness of this Hotel. The front desk staff was very helpful. The location is within easy walking distance to many popular areas including Broadway and Times Square. Luggage could be stored for early arrival and late departures, which was very convenient! The room was a good size, 2 comfortable queen size beds, small refrigerator and nice bathroom. I would definitely recommend this Hotel.

title: Great location
text:
The hotel was clean, it is close to Time Square, you just need walk and you will find all that you need, the parking its so expensive $52 for day but you can parking free on Sunday and you can search coupons for parking during the week we payed $20 for 6h.
the only thing but in the room it that the bathroom its too noisy you can even hear went other people in other rooms go to the bathroom.

title: Clean, friendly service, not a lot of amenities
text: We had a glorious NYC vacation.  Was not sure of this location based upon internet reservation but it's only a few blocks from Times Square and Penn Station.  It was clean and relatively quiet, given you are in the hustle/bustle of NYC.  Kind of on a side street that's a little dirty but still manageable.  The staff were VERY friendly and helpful and kind.  They offered directions and free breakfast because we never connected with WiFi despite their attempts to correct it.  One small little weird thing was to have a window washer banging against the window at 8am and opening the curtains to a man standing there on the 2nd floor EEK!  Not sure if or how they could give a heads up on this one. LOL  Overall, would stay here again.  No pool or hot tub but just a place to rest and clean up.  Work out room was convenient and well taken care of.  Breakfast not included and expensive so we hit Dunkin Donuts up the street and/or someplace out in Times Square.  Fun times!

title: Great hotel, great location, great staff!
text: Stayed here for 2 nights over July 4th weekend. The location was great for shopping, restaurants, and theater. We walked everywhere! The front desk could not have been more helpful and friendly. They gave us perfect restaurant advice and advice about directions and attractions. Our room faced the street and we had a little view of the empire state building. The room is small, but quite adequate and the bathroom was spacious. We had everything we needed. I would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Peccato la colazione
text: Abbiamo scelto di spendere di più rispetto ad altre offerte perché era inclusa la colazione sperando nel classico buffet, ma ci siamo ritrovati ad una scelta limitata fra colazione o fredda o calda con poche cose comprese. Alla fine in questo slalom fra le cose, ci siamo ritrovati anche 10$ in più, abbiamo evitato la discussione, ma la prossima volta non so se ci ritorneremo anche perché la stanza era piccola nonostante i metri dichiarati. Comunque wi-fi ottima quella normale e personale molto gentile.

title: 良好的服务极具优势的地理位置，推荐！
text:
Courtyard New York Manhattan位于西37街，而著名的Times Square位于西42街。

5条街道的距离徒步过去时代广场的核心区域不到8分钟。

良好的地理位置决定了这家酒店的方便程度与纽约同呼吸。

TAXI到达这家酒店时已近下午1点，

狭窄的街道、人流车流混杂让这条街道变得异常繁忙

楼宇之间一线天顿然出现

见有人拖着行李进入，靠最里面的一位MM主动微笑着招手打招呼

问我需要什么帮助

虽然明知是下午3点酒店才开放入住，但抱着试试看的心里还是告知CHECK IN

报上预定姓名，前台MM微笑着查看有无空房，不到1分钟告知正好有一间，7楼的

若要高楼层的需要到下午3点后才有。

想想行李放进去，冲个凉即可去时代广场等地闲逛了马上答应。

CHECK IN速度很快，押金20美金，一并温馨提示10天后返回到卡上，

赞！

酒店健身房设备设施比较新，无论跑步机还是器械等充分满足个性化的健身需求

总体来说，酒店地处曼哈顿时代广场核心片区，良好的服务

极具优势的地理位置，

让这家酒店显得极具竞争力

强烈推荐！

title: Mittendrin statt nur dabei - empfehlenswert !
text: Das Courtyard Time Square ist wirklich mittendrin. Ein Steinwurf zum Time Square und mehrere Subway-Stations unmittelbar um das Hotel. Für ein Städtetrip optimale Bedingungen. Das Hotel ist sauber und modern eingerichtet. Die Zimmer sind klein, aber zumutbar (für Manhattan). Riesen TV, großes Bad und gut klimatisiert. Direkt in der Lobby ein kleiner Starbucks mit den üblich erforderlichen Frühstücksfeatures. Wir haben für 4 Nächte € 965,-- gezahlt, was für örtliche Verhältnisse und erhaltene Leistung absolut in Ordnung war.

title: Hotel molto confortevole
text: L'hotel è nuovo ben arredato e dotato di ogni confort. Nella lobby pc, riviste e giornali e un bar. La nostra camera era al 14 piano ma purtroppo non avevamo una bella vista che invece ai piani più alti sicuramente si ha. Se vi fa piacere richiedetela! Avevamo una camera king size quindi c'era molto spazio e il letto era davvero comodissimo. Il bagno enorme. Pulizia ottima! Il personale davvero molto gentile e disponible. Wi-fi gratuito perfettamente funzionante! Come posizione è comodo per Times square e per la 5th. In generale come zona è parecchio trafficata e pieno di catene di ristoranti. Non è proprio un quartiere caratteristico. In ogni caso l'hotel lo consiglio senz'altro!

title: New York size and price - great location
text:
The hotel was very clean, staff was very friendly, and the room was very small.  It's difficult to pay over $300 for a room where you can barely turn around. They did not have room service, but happily offered me multiple menus for locations that would deliver about every type of food imaginable.
You can't beat the location, so if that's what you're looking for and you won't be hanging out in the room very much, this is a great hotel. It's only blocks from union station, which is a great bonus as well.

title: Great
text: It was clean, small. We were on the 2nd floor and couldn't here the noise of the street. Rooms were a great size for New York and we were close to everything! There were 7 of us that stayed there and we all were happy with it. Bar was not opened too late which would be our only complaint.

title: Lovely Hotel with excellent CS
text:
This is a lovey hotel near Times Square.

I would like to give special mention to  Robert at the FD
He gave me and my niece an excellent customer service.
Our check in was very quick and very smooth and
He gave us a lovely room on the 25th floor.
Thank you Robert for giving us that room.

title: Nice hotel , good service but small room
text:
Nice hotel n location for price paid and Walking distance to Time Square. 

But the room was very small hence it is not very good for families with small kids or couples with many big luggages. And they also do not provide bedroom slippers to the hotel guests. 

However, the staff service were good n friendly. And they accede to all my special hotel requests as a Marriott member which I felt was very important.

title: Valueable Hotels in Manhattan
text: New, clean, nice staff, near to subway, comfortable bed, cozy, quite, free wireless and cable network. I even got a surprise during my staying with a bottle of wine and fruit. With it's price, what do you want more? For sure I will stay here next time. Recommend!

title: Прекрасный отель в центре Манхеттена
text:
Прекрасно расположенный отель, недалеко Таймс Сквер, центральный парк в 20 минутах ходьбы.

Номера довольно большие, просторная ванна, хорошая косметика в ванной (Paul Mitchell). В номере есть чайничек, кружки, чай, кофе. Рядом полно разных кафе-ресторанов. 

Если номер выходит на дорогу, то запах оттуда будет стоять приличный, да и шум, хоть улица и не особо широкая и шумная. есть вай-фай.

title: Tiny Bathroom
text: If you are traveling alone on Business I would say this is n ok choice. If however, you are considering bringing a significant other or children pass on this location. Although Marriott did a fine job updating/remodeling this hotel there is only so much you can do with an old/small bathroom. The sink area is so small there is not even room for one toiletry bag on the sink counter and there are no other shelves or cubby space to keep one. Every time you use the bathroom you need to first make sure you have everything you need with you. Also, we reported that the room safe was not working on the first day of a 3 day stay. It was not fixed until the last day when we checked out. We stay at many Courtyards & Marriott's and especially in NYC there are better choices

title: Tacky
text: There's no denying the location is excellent, but I was shocked at the condition of the hotel with rooms that clearly had not been refurbished for years and even stains on the furniture. Perhaps this isnt an issue for most guests who are out all day and value the location over ambience, but this certainly does the Marriott Group no credit, and as a result I switched hotels after one night. I will say though that the hotel staff were excellent; very efficient, helpful and pleasant.

title: Good hotel near Time Square
text: The hotel was nice, clean and updated, and the rooms were a decent size for NYC. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful with any questions we had. The location was also very good - just a few blocks away from time square. We noticed there were a few shady characters hanging out on that street at night, but I think most of the city is like that.

title: Vacationing
text:
Nice convenient place,, the price over the room size though! But am from the South, where size and your pockets go hand in hand! Will give this place a 4🌟, for convince and everything they have within these tiny rooms!
Other than the size,, I'll give it a 5🌟

title: Perfect location to visit Manhattan
text: Perfect location to visit Manhattan. 10 min walking to the Flatiron, 30 minutes to Central Park and 5 minutes to Times Square. Rooms are modern, fully equipped and clean. Receptionists are at any time ready to assist you in any way, from booking a town car to provide information.

title: Nice place to come home to!
text: This hotel was just perfect for our get away to New York.  A short walk from Penn Station where we arrived from and a short walk to Times Square as well as Madison Square Garden.  It was peaceful and quiet which is just what is needed after a busy day exploring the city.  The king size bed was comfortable, the air conditioning worked perfectly and the shower was  refreshing.  The room is small but very efficiently arranged.  Check in was simple with very friendly staff, check out was easy as well and we appreciated the ability to store suitcases for a few hours before our flight left.  There is food available at the hotel but restaurants and shops are nearby as well.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Amazing Concierge's Customer Care!
text: It was a pleasure meeting Amine Khodja, Concierge, during our stay in New York. A thank you to Amine for the exemplary service the entire week long! My sister and I were truly impressed by his sincerity and suggestions when planning our days in the Big Apple. Amine should be recognized for his outstanding customer care.

title: Great stay in MidTown
text: This is a great hotel in the Fashion District of NYC. In easy walking distance of Times Square and Madison Square Garden. The room was clean and comfortable. The room included a fridge, hairdryer, iron, free wifi, and safe. We actually drove to NYC and parking was available just a few doors up the street. The garage works with the hotel to give guests in and out privileges. The property included a bistro restaurant but we did not take any meals there. All of the staff that we encountered were extremely friendly. Instead of just telling me where the parking garage was the desk clerk went out to the street with me to point it out. I just found that to be a special touch to make sure I was not lost. If you are looking for a clean/comfortable room in MidTown I highly recommend the Courtyard.

title: Loved the location
text:
Stayed here for 2 weeks and had a very enjoyable time. Very very central, times square just minutes away on foot, Macys flagship store less than 10 minutes on foot, Central Park a short cab ride under 5 minutes or was about 25 minutes for us on foot with a 4 year old.
Took breakfast with our stay, slightly over rated and sometimes difficult to get a table, particularly if there happens to be an event and the hotel is heavily booked. Plenty of small cafes nearby, with a better selection, guaranteed table, and slightly cheaper.
Security was good however one guard we encountered was much less courteous than the others...it is a hotel not a night club, and he would do well to take a course in customer service.
Rooms were large, a large comfortable bed, sheets felt great. 
We would without question stay here again.
Tip, book online through 3rd party sites as we got greater discounts and a better deal than going direct with the hotel.

Enjoy you stay!!

title: Surprisingly Quiet!
text: I try to avoid staying in midtown because of the noise and crowds and tiny rooms, but came here for a family event. I was pleasantly surprised by my sunny room with a large bathroom and so quiet!  The lobby staff has a good attitude and I felt fortunate that my room was ready early. They also helped me make a wake-up call to a family member the next morning.

title: Great base to explore the city.
text:
Stayed for 5 nights on 8th floor overlooking 37th st. Hotel offers perfect location to explore the many attractions and places of interest, its location being on 37th and 8th is very good. Shops and restaurants close by or within short walk, the only slight downside is that there is some sort of health centre or clinic next door on same side with a needle drop box outside. In the mornings there are one or two charactors milling around. Having said this we did not feel at all unsafe as this was usually in the daytime during open hours and at night it was no problem so dont let this put you off in any way as the Hotel is very good with good staff and a secure lift system which only operates with your keycard so no security problems noticed. Room very good size for big city and bed was comfortable, air con unit worked very well and alternatively you could even open the window slightly if fresh air needed. The bathroom was good size too and the walk in shower was excellent. Hotel has restaurant although we did not use it, opting instead to go over the road to dunkin doughnuts for coffee and tea take outs. They do pretty good bagal as well and all very cheap. Houndstooth pub directly over on 8th is pretty good too for lunchtime or evening eats. Some subway stations within fairly short walk either uptown or downtown.For those unfamilier with the NY subway just be sure you are travelling in right direction and at some stations make sure you enter the correct side of the street ,as some do not inter connect like our system, otherwise its very cheap and although not as regular as the tube, it runs pretty well and is pretty safe to use. We travelled back late one night from the bronx after a yankees game and it felt  pretty safe.
Other altenatives are Uber taxis which we used quite a bit to get us either further uptown or to central park, of to go right down to battery park or the east river piers. You could always try your luck hailing  the yellow cabs but that is not always as easy,and certainly not as cheap as Uber.
Hotel is well situated to walk to the Hudson river or the high line, so all in all a very good ,comfortable base whilst in the city. Would recommend for comfort, room quality , location,and value.

title: A silent hotel in the heart of the city
text: This is the third time we are picking up this area since it is walking distance to many attractions that we like. Always crowded,( too much maybe)  all stores open till late night, noisy, dirty , but we like it. The hotel however has a very good sound proof , allowing a good sleep to help you recover from the long walks. The rest is all good.

title: Preis Leistung Top
text:
Das Hotel liegt wenige Straßen vom Times Square entfernt. Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und verfügte über alles was man benötigt. Haartrockner, Safe, Flachbildschirm. Über das große Fenster konnte man das Empire State Building und die Aussicht des 33. Stocks genießen.
Für Paare oder Singles ist es ein klasse Hotel zu einem guten Preis.

title: Comodo per Javits e Time Square
text: Ottima posizione: a piedi si può raggiungere sia il Javits Center, se devi partecipare ad una fiera come nel mio caso, e Time Square. Non è economico ma a New York è normale. Con Booking la colazione era compresa, una colazione abbastanza semplice.

title: Impressive!!
text: First impression was Nice, clean, very contemporary! Concierge was very nice, walked us to the elevators and showed us how to use them. The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet which was pretty shocking considering it was NYC!! Never heard anything! The fitness center was very nice! The location was great only a few blocks from Times Square! The subway was within a block!

title: 乾淨 快速的服務 未來會再考慮該飯店
text: 地點相當優秀 離景點很近 附近餐廳很多 夜生活很方便 房間也夠大 廁所備品有些太簡單 未來會考慮繼續入住

title: Very comfortable stay and great staff!
text: I arrived after a redeye flight and was considering begging for an early checkin. I didn't even have to ask and was given a key before 9am. Four days later, after getting on the wrong train I made it back to the hotel late for checkout. They were so understanding! The room itself was great- big for NYC, perfect temperature controls, quality soap and shampoo products, plenty of plugs in the right places. Last time I was in NY, I stayed a little closer to Times Square so this felt "far" but still wasn't far at all. Perfect location between my business trip locations and restaurants and fun! Would definitely stay here again!!

title: Perfect for a short trip to New York
text: This hotel gave us all we needed for a trip to New York. The location was great as it wasn't too far from most places we wanted to visit, although I'm not sure I'd recommend it to families - the area is very busy and a little rough, partly due to the proximity to Times Square. Great for others travellers though. The room was not massive, but not too small either, and it was very clean. Bed was big and very comfy. We didn't have great views but didn't mind. Good facilities, as although we didn't use them, there was a cafe area for breakfast, a gym and I think a laundry room. The staff were friendly and helpful, and we were able to leave our bags for a few hours after check on on the last day, before our flight, which was no problem.

title: Very good location and clean room
text:
I enjoyed staying this hotel.  The hotel has a very nice cafe where I could buy coffee and light meals until late at night.   The room was clean, although the space was limited in the king size bed room.

The location was perfect to visit tourist locations in the city.

title: Excelente ubicación- Buen Hotel
